2nd-grade-1.name: Adding within 20 using place value blocks
2nd-grade-1.description: Sal adds 8 + 6 using place value blocks. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-2.name: Adding within 20 using ten frame
2nd-grade-2.description: Sal adds 8 + 7 using ten frames. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-3.name: Adding 7 + 6
2nd-grade-3.description: Sal adds 7 + 6 using the number line. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-4.name: Adding 8 + 7
2nd-grade-4.description: In the video it demonstrates adding 8 + 7 using a visual approach. Adding emphasizes the concept of place value, showing that 15 is made up of 1 group of 10 and 5 ones. This method helps students understand addition within 20 in a more concrete way. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-5.name: Adding with arrays
2nd-grade-5.description: Sal shows how to relate repeated addition to an array. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-6.name: Using arrays in word problems
2nd-grade-6.description: Sal uses addition to solve array word problems. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-7.name: Repeated addition: haircuts
2nd-grade-7.description: Sal solves word problems by adding the same number many times.

2nd-grade-8.name: Subtract within 20 using a number line
2nd-grade-8.description: Sal subtracts 17 - 9 using a number line. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-9.name: Subtract within 20 using place value blocks
2nd-grade-9.description: Sal subtracts 13-4 using place value blocks. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-10.name: Subtract within 20 using ten frames
2nd-grade-10.description: Sal subtracts 13-6 using ten frames. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-11.name: Subtracting 14 - 6
2nd-grade-11.description: Sal subtracts 14 - 6 by first thinking about subtracting 2 and 4. Created by Sal Khan.

2nd-grade-12.name: Addition and subtraction word problems: gorillas
2nd-grade-12.description: Sal solves addition and subtraction word problems.

2nd-grade-13.name: Addition and subtraction word problems: superheroes
2nd-grade-13.description: Sal solves 1 addition and 1 subtraction word problem.
